evidence.text:
NELLIE: That's enough. Both of you. Please continue, Mr. Kemp.
JUSTIN: Thank you, Ma'am. All I'm trying to say is: Let's put everything else aside for a minute and remember two key points: 1) Sythe went to trial instead of taking a plea. And 2) He testified instead of taking the fifth. Now, that doesn't mean he's innocent. But I think he's earned a few hours of our time to be sure.
